definitions: 海流[かいりゅう] (n) ocean current

definitions: 看病[かんびょう] (n, vs) nursing (a patient)
english: I could look after him instead.
japanese: オイラ、看病かわってもいいな

definitions: お次[おつぎ] (n, adj-no) next, next person,room adjoining a noble's parlor
english: Where shall we go next? Shall we head for the Corel reactor?
japanese: お次はなんだ？コレルの魔晄炉だったかぁ？

definitions: 泡[あわ] (n) bubble, foam, froth, head on beer
粟[あわ] (n) foxtail millet (Setaria italica), Italian millet (also Hungarian, German)
english: Yaah! Shall we take off?
japanese: あわ！　いくですか？

definitions: 時化[しけ] (n) stormy weather (at sea),poor catch of fish (due to stormy seas),poor turn-out, recession
師家[しけ] (n) Zen master
english: What's that sad face for?
japanese: な～にシケた顔してるんだぁ？

definitions: ちらっと (adv) at a glance, by accident
english: Yo, wanna see what TIFA and the gang are doing?
japanese: おい、ちらっとTIFAたちの様子でも見にいかねえか？

definitions: 吹き出す[ふきだす] (v5s, vt) to spout out, to spurt out, to gush out, to jet out,to sprout, to bud,to burst into laughter,to blow (smoke, etc.),to send out shoots (of a tree)
english: They said the Lifestream sometimes suddenly gushes out at the Southern island.
japanese: 南の島で、ときどきライフストリームがブワーッてふきだしたりするんだって

definitions: 頬っぺた[ほっぺた] (n) cheek
english: You saw him slapping Scarlet around?
japanese: スカーレットのほっぺたバシバシしばいてましたやろ？

definitions: 芝[しば] (n) lawn, sod, turf
柴[しば] (n) brushwood, firewood
司馬[しば] (n) Minister of War (Zhou-dynasty China)
駟馬[しば] (n) four horse carriage
死馬[しば] (n) dead horse
english: You saw him slapping Scarlet around?
japanese: スカーレットのほっぺたバシバシしばいてましたやろ？

definitions: 要注意[ようちゅうい] (n) attention (care) required, needs special attention
english: Now we've got to be careful. I know Heidegger and his gang are plotting something.
japanese: でも、こういう時は要注意ですのや。ハイデッカーたちがなんか考えてるにちがいまへんわ

definitions: 膨らむ[ふくらむ] (v5m, vi) to expand, to swell (out), to get big, to become inflated
english: Too much hope is the opposite of despair.
japanese: ふくらみすぎた希望は絶望の裏返し

definitions: 裏返し[うらがえし] (n) inside out, upside down,flip side, opposite, contrary, reverse
english: Too much hope is the opposite of despair.
japanese: ふくらみすぎた希望は絶望の裏返し

definitions: 打ちのめす[うちのめす] (v5s, vt) to knock down, to beat (someone) up,to injure (someone) so badly they cannot recover (esp. emotionally), to overwhelm (with mental anguish, etc.)
english: An overpowering love may consume you in the end.
japanese: 大きすぎる愛はおまえを打ちのめすことになるかもしれない……

definitions: 労い[ねぎらい] (n) appreciation, thanks, gratitude
english: I have no words of comfort. Of course, I don't believe you're the type who needs the kindness from others…
japanese: ねぎらいの言葉すら、私は知らない。もっとも、あんたは他人の優しさにすがるような人間ではなさそうだが……

definitions: 優しい[やさしい] (adj-i) tender, kind, gentle, graceful, affectionate, amiable
english: I have no words of comfort. Of course, I don't believe you're the type who needs the kindness from others…
japanese: ねぎらいの言葉すら、私は知らない。もっとも、あんたは他人の優しさにすがるような人間ではなさそうだが……

definitions: 縋る[すがる] (v5r) to cling to, to hang onto,to rely on, to depend on,to implore, to entreat
蜾蠃[すがる] (n) red-banded sand wasp (Ammophila sabulosa),deer
english: I have no words of comfort. Of course, I don't believe you're the type who needs the kindness from others…
japanese: ねぎらいの言葉すら、私は知らない。もっとも、あんたは他人の優しさにすがるような人間ではなさそうだが……
